channel.title: Arabic/English server?
channel.description:
I have seen in many servers that arab players have problems in game like dialogues and quests and many other things so I have thought about making a english/arabic server which allowes you to chose your language and you will play a client with all the scripts and everything in your language
So will that be a supported server?

item.title: Arabic/English server?
item.dc:creator: @emperor1975 emperor1975
item.description:
@emperor1975 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:7, topic:548999”]Don’t waste your time on 2 clients. It gets too stressful and etc later on (When adding bigger more important updates).
Make a single client that has support for both, or as Bowser jr said, only support the one language.[/quote]

You’r right it might get stressful when I add updates

Thanks for the feedback, Im not doing it

Read full topic

item.title: Arabic/English server?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Don’t waste your time on 2 clients. It gets too stressful and etc later on (When adding bigger more important updates).
Make a single client that has support for both, or as Bowser jr said, only support the one language.

Read full topic

item.title: Arabic/English server?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Wouldn’t you have a problem with a split playerbase? One speaking English and one Arabic? If you want to make a server catering to Arabs, you wouldn’t need an English client.

Read full topic

item.title: Arabic/English server?
item.dc:creator: @emperor1975 emperor1975
item.description:
@emperor1975 wrote:

Im a arabic so I can change all the the dialogue to arabic and all things so arab player can understand it

Here is what Im thinking of I create 2 clients 1 is arabic 1 is english and I create a loader to chose your language thats bretty simple but the translating might take some time.
Im glad that you like my idea.

If I didnt know how to add the arabic letters I might use the arabic english writing like this

Listen=Asm3

Asm3=اسمع

Read full topic

item.title: Arabic/English server?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Bowser jr:

Also make sure you that the server and client is configured to support unicode characters.

Yes, that reminds me.

If you want to use Arabic, and use the built-in game font, you’ll have to modify it to add the arabic glyphs to it. Or, replace the rendering of the strings on screen with normal Font stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Arabic/English server?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Also make sure you that the server and client is configured to support unicode characters.

Read full topic

item.title: Arabic/English server?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“emperor1975, post:1, topic:548999”]I have seen in many servers that arab players have problems in game like dialogues and quests and many other things so I have thought about making a english/arabic server which allowes you to chose your language and you will play a client with all the scripts and everything in your language

So will that be a supported server?[/quote]

If all you’re doing is changing the string data to be in Arabic rather than English, you should be fine. Granted, you’ll have to refactor quite a bit to use an identifier (like varrock_guard_message) instead of the value.

Read full topic
